attr.title: Daikatana
attr.desc: Travel through time to fight a corrupted dictatorship and right the wrongs inflicted on the world.
attr.desc_md: In 2455 A.D., Kage Mishima used the magical powers of the Daikatana, the most powerful sword ever forged, to alter time and establish himself as supreme dictator. You are Hiro Miyamoto, one of the few people on Earth who remembers what really happened.
attr.inst: You must add the retail data files from the 'data/' folder to the port's 'daikatana/gamedata/' folder.
